desc: A new premium Canadian gift box! We celebrate and honour those who have made it to the greatest age of life. Unique treasures intentionally selected to engage and enhance the experiences for aging brains. Send a box of love to someone special! We give back with each box sold. We support artisans and small businesses

layout.text:
HAPPY FATHER'S DAY SALE!
Deliver a box of surprise to your special guy (or gal).
